title: CURATED COMPUTERS
description: CURATED COMPUTERS - is an extensive sound library containing 180 unique files of Computers (Hard drives, Keyboards, Mouse, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions.
longDescription: CURATED COMPUTERS - is an extensive sound library containing 180 unique files of Computers (Hard drives, Keyboards, Mouse, Etc.) in varying environments and conditions ranging from new and old hard drives, plastic and mechanical keyboards, boot-up and shutdown, servers, fans, and failing parts. All of our libraries comply with the Universal Category System metadata naming convention standard. Files are presented in 44.1 kHz/ 16 bit (VIDEO GAME).
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  180 Unique .wav files of Computers in various environments and conditions.
  •  Universal Category System metadata file naming standard.
  •  Royalty-Free.

Number of Audio Waves: 180

Number of Audio Cues: 180

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 100

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1f5GVkySsjSH_P65qHGtJpSjdee2xWw23/view?usp=share_link

Demo: https://soundcloud.com/sound-assets/curated-computers-demo?si=328a9c7654274dcba3dae63dcf5d8001&utm_source=clipboard&utm_medium=text&utm_campaign=social_sharing
